properties.name: museum-tour.museum.max-returned
properties.description: How much museums can be returned at once through search.

properties.name: museum-tour.museum.refresh-cron
properties.description: How often to refresh local data for museums.

properties.name: museum-tour.weather.cities-per-request
properties.description: For how many cities should weather endpoint return forecasts.

properties.description: File location of json file containing info about cities in openweather database.

properties.name: museum-tour.weather.openweather.image-url
properties.description: Template for accessing weather icons for openweather.
